code: import{applyMiddleware,combineReducers,compose,createStore}from'redux';import thunkMiddleware from'redux-thunk';import pokemonReducer from'./pokemonReducer';var reducers=combineReducers({pokemon:pokemonReducer});var composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;var store=createStore(reducers,composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(thunkMiddleware)));window.__store__=store;export default store;
